K10D0340_H0346:97a-14: de nas lhas byin gyis kyang sa 'tsho ma'i tshig
K10D0340_H0346:97a-15: nyan nas sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te de'i
K10D0340_H0346:97a-17: de nas sa 'tsho mas de'i thal mo sbyar ba
K10D0340_H0346:97a-18: bzung ste drag tu bcir nas de'i sor mo thams
K10D0340_H0346:97a-19: cad las khrag byung ste lhas byin de'i nad kyis
K10D0340_H0346:97a-20: nyam thag pas khus btab bo //
K10D0340_H0346:97a-21: de nas sa 'tsho mas skas de nyid la mgo
K10D0340_H0346:97a-22: thur kar bstan te mgo bor rdog pas bsnun nas
K10D0340_H0346:97a-24: bud med gzhan rnams kyis kyang kha cig gis ni /
K10D0340_H0346:97a-25: de'i lus ba lang gi lci bas gtor ro //
K10D0340_H0346:97a-26: kha cig gis ni; 'bru mar tshan mos gtor to //
K10D0340_H0346:97a-27: de nas de'i lus snad cing rmas bzhin du de'i
K10D0340_H0346:97a-28: nang nas byung ste song nas de ko ka li
K10D0340_H0346:97a-29: ka dang / khan da dra ba bya dang /
K10D0340_H0346:97a-30: ka ta mor ti shya dang /
K10D0340_H0346:97b-0: rgya mtshos @97b byin rnams kyi thad du song ste /
K10D0340_H0346:97b-1: de dag gis de mthong nas smras pa /
K10D0340_H0346:97b-4: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi gnad chen khyod kyis btsun mo 'khor gyi bde ba dag legs par myong mod /
K10D0340_H0346:97b-5: de nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K10D0340_H0346:97b-6: dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10D0340_H0346:97b-8: sa 'tsho mas lhas byin mi mang sar ji ltar dma' phab pa la gzigs /
K10D0340_H0346:97b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0340_H0346:97b-10: da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
K10D0340_H0346:97b-11: 'das pa'i dus na'ang sa 'tsho mas lhas byin ji ltar dma' phab pa de nyon cig /
K10D0340_H0346:97b-13: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer w'a
K10D0340_H0346:97b-14: ra n'a si na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes
K10D0340_H0346:97b-15: bya ba rgyal po byed do //
K10D0340_H0346:97b-16: yul bi de ha na ni /
K10D0340_H0346:97b-17: rgyal po dbang chen sde zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de /
K10D0340_H0346:97b-18: de gnyis phan tshun mi mthun pas dus dus su skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed do //
K10D0340_H0346:97b-19: de nas phyi zhig na k'a shi'i yrgyal po tshangs
K10D0340_H0346:97b-20: pas byin blon po'i tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te
K10D0340_H0346:97b-21: 'khod pa'i nang du bud med kyi gtam gyi gleng
K10D0340_H0346:97b-22: bslangs nas khyed kyi nang na su dag gis bud
K10D0340_H0346:97b-23: med gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa
K10D0340_H0346:97b-24: dag gang du mthong zhes dris nas der sus bud
K10D0340_H0346:97b-25: med ji lta bu mthong ba des rgyal po de
K10D0340_H0346:97b-26: la de kho na bzhin du gsol to //
K10D0340_H0346:97b-27: der gcig cig gis smras pa /
K10D0340_H0346:97b-29: de dag thams cad lta zhog gi /
K10D0340_H0346:98a-0: pi de ha'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa de dang byad gzugs 'dra ba @98a *//
K10D0340_H0346:98a-1: ni; bud med su'ang ma mchis so //
K10D0340_H0346:98a-2: zhes byas nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po
K10D0340_H0346:98a-3: de 'dod chags kyi mngas po gnas des bsam pa
K10D0340_H0346:98a-4: / bdag gis rgyal po dbang chen sde dang mi mthun bzhin du ni /
K10D0340_H0346:98a-5: de dang phrad par bya mi nus kyi /
K10D0340_H0346:98a-6: bdag gis sngar de dang mjal du ma byas nas
K10D0340_H0346:98a-7: de'i 'og tu sla bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsam
K10D0340_H0346:98a-8: nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis pi da ha'i
K10D0340_H0346:98a-9: rgyal po dang mjal dum byas pa'i 'og tu rgyal
K10D0340_H0346:98a-10: po dbang chen sde'i btsun mo la bud med po
K10D0340_H0346:98a-11: nyar btang ste / bdag gis dbang chen sde dang
K10D0340_H0346:98a-12: mjal dum byas ba ci yang rung ba de dag
K10D0340_H0346:98a-13: nyar btang ste / thams cad ni / khyod kyi phyir yin gyi /
K10D0340_H0346:98a-14: de shes par gyis la ci nas bdag khyod dang
K10D0340_H0346:98a-15: phrad par 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig ces spring
K10D0340_H0346:98a-16: ngo // de nas dbang chen sde'i btsun mos rgyal po la spran te /
K10D0340_H0346:98a-18: rgyal po tshangs pas byin de ni /
K10D0340_H0346:98a-19: bdag 'tshal zhes don sgrub cing mchis kyi /
K10D0340_H0346:98a-20: gal te lhas bdag la bka' stsal na ni /
K10D0340_H0346:98a-21: bdag gis de dma' dbab par 'tshal zhes byas so //
K10D0340_H0346:98a-23: khyod ji ltar dga' ba de bzhin du gyis la
K10D0340_H0346:98a-24: ci nas de nga'i lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ba
K10D0340_H0346:98a-28: ji ltar dgyes pa bzhin du mdzad du mchis par bdag gis bgyi bar 'tshal gyi /
K10D0340_H0346:98a-29: thugs mi chung bar gsol zhes byas nas des de la pho nya'i lan spring ngo //
K10D0340_H0346:98b-0: rgyal po 'di gson por 'dug bzhin du @98b ni /
K10D0340_H0346:98b-1: bdag gis khyod dang mjal bar bgyi ba'i rngo mi thogs kyi /
K10D0340_H0346:98b-3: de'i 'og tu bdag dang mjal bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0340_H0346:98b-5: de nas tshangs pas byin gyis bsam pa /
K10D0340_H0346:98b-6: mi mthun par ma byas kyi bar du ni /
K10D0340_H0346:98b-7: bdag gis de gsad du mi rung gi /
K10D0340_H0346:98b-8: phyir yang bdag gis de dang mi mthun par bya'o
K10D0340_H0346:98b-9: snyam du bsam nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis
K10D0340_H0346:98b-10: rgyal po dbang chen sde dang phyir yang mi mthun
K10D0340_H0346:98b-11: par byas nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go
K10D0340_H0346:98b-12: bskon te yul pi de har song nas grong khyer
K10D0340_H0346:98b-13: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhis bskor te 'dug go
K10D0340_H0346:98b-14: / de de na 'dug pas skye bo phal po che kha 'dog par byed do //
K10D0340_H0346:98b-15: de nas dbang chen sde'i btsun mos spring ste /
K10D0340_H0346:98b-16: khyod 'dir gshegs pa ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni /
K10D0340_H0346:98b-17: bdag gi phyir du bas na /
K10D0340_H0346:98b-18: skye bo mang po dgum ci 'tshal gyi /
K10D0340_H0346:98b-19: da'ang mi phal ba'i cha lugs su zhugs la grong
K10D0340_H0346:98b-20: khyer gyi nang du gshegs te bdag dang mjal bar
K10D0340_H0346:98b-21: mdzad du gsol zhes spring ngo //
K10D0340_H0346:98b-22: de nas de thos ma thag tu k'a shi'i rgyal
K10D0340_H0346:98b-23: po tshangs pas byin thabs ji ltar bstan bzhin du
K10D0340_H0346:98b-24: rgyal po'i pho brang gi nang du 'ongs so //
K10D0340_H0346:98b-25: de 'ongs ma thag tu dbang chen sde'i btsun mo des bzung nas rgyal po la spran te /
K10D0340_H0346:98b-28: lhas ci dgyes par mdzad du mchis par gyur lags so //
K10D0340_H0346:99a-0: de nas rgyal po dbang chen sdes rgyal po'i spas @99a *//
K10D0340_H0346:99a-1: dang blon po dang tshong dpon dang phyug po dang
K10D0340_H0346:99a-2: ded dpon thams cad bsags nas k'a shi'i rgyal po
K10D0340_H0346:99a-3: tshangs pas byin gyi mgo bor rdog pas bsnun te
K10D0340_H0346:99a-4: smras pa / 'di ci nas phyin chad gzhan gyi
K10D0340_H0346:99a-5: chung ma la byi pho byed par mi 'gyur bar
K10D0340_H0346:99a-7: de nas rgyal po dbang chen sde la btsun mos gsol pa /
K10D0340_H0346:99a-9: 'di dma' phab pa 'di nyid gum pa bas ches thu ba ma lags sam /
K10D0340_H0346:99a-10: da 'di lhag par dgum du ci mchis kyi /
K10D0340_H0346:99a-11: thong lags zhes gsol nas gson por btang ngo //
K10D0340_H0346:99a-14: de'i tshe de'i dus na yul pi de ha'i rgyal po dbang chen sder gyur pa /
K10D0340_H0346:99a-15: byang chub kyi spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10D0340_H0346:99a-17: de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun mor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10D0340_H0346:99a-19: de'i tshe k'a shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni /
K10D0340_H0346:99a-21: de'i tshe'ang des 'di mi mang sar rdog pas bsnun te shin tu dma' phab bo //
K10D0340_H0346:99a-22: skra ldan ma zhes bya ba ni /
K10D0340_H0346:99a-23: byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas su bzhugs
K10D0340_H0346:99a-24: tsam na yul ser skya'i gnas rgyal po sengge'i 'gram
K10D0340_H0346:99a-26: de btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga'
K10D0340_H0346:99a-27: la dga' mgur spyod pa las snga phyir bu pho
K10D0340_H0346:99a-28: bzhi dang bu mo bzhi btsas te zas gtsang dang
K10D0340_H0346:99b-0: @99b zas dkar dang bre bo zas dang bdud rtsi
K10D0340_H0346:99b-1: zas dang / gtsang ma dang dkar mo dang bre bo ma dang bdud rtsi ma rnams so //
K10D0340_H0346:99b-2: de'i tshe yul spod byed na rgyal po sh'akya rab sad gnas te /
K10D0340_H0346:99b-3: de'i btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' mgur spyod pa la bu mo gnyis btsas te /
K10D0340_H0346:99b-7: sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes btags so //
K10D0340_H0346:99b-8: de nas de gnyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar
K10D0340_H0346:99b-9: dang zhun mar dang mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings
K10D0340_H0346:99b-10: te / mtsho'i nang gi padma bzhin du skye drag
K10D0340_H0346:99b-11: par gyur to; ;de nas de gnyis la mtshan mkhan
K10D0340_H0346:99b-12: rnams kyis bltas nas bu mo sgyu 'phrul las ni
K10D0340_H0346:99b-13: te / / bu mtshan phun sum tshogs pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur la /
K10D0340_H0346:99b-14: sgyu 'phrul chen mo las ni; 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po btsa' bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0340_H0346:99b-16: de nyid kyi skra til mar gyi thigs pa chung blugs pa bzhin du rgyas par gyur to //
K10D0340_H0346:99b-17: de nas rgyal po sengge 'gram gyis thos nas rgyal po rab sad la pho nya btang ste /
K10D0340_H0346:99b-18: khyod kyi bu mo de gnyis bdag gi bu'i chung mar byin cig /
K10D0340_H0346:99b-20: sus kyang thabs zlar bab pa'i chung ma gnyis mi
K10D0340_H0346:99b-21: blang ba'i nang khrims de lta bu btsas mod kyi
K10D0340_H0346:99b-22: / gal te bdag gis sh'akya rnams kyis dad pa gnang bar byed nus na /
K10D0340_H0346:100a-1: zhes springs nas sengge 'gram gyis sh'akya rnams la gsol
K10D0340_H0346:100a-2: ba btab nas de'i bu mo gnyis khyim na gnas
K10D0340_H0346:100a-3: pa rnams kyi khyim pa'i chos bzhin du byas te
K10D0340_H0346:100a-4: zas gtsang gi btsun mor blangs so //
K10D0340_H0346:100a-5: der rgyal po rab sad kyis de gnyis la bu
K10D0340_H0346:100a-6: mo skra ldan ma zhes bya ba skra mkhan du
K10D0340_H0346:100a-7: byin no // de nas gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa na /
K10D0340_H0346:100a-8: de btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa'i 'og tu sgyu
K10D0340_H0346:100a-9: 'phrul shi nas de shi ba'i 'og tu sum cu
K10D0340_H0346:100a-10: rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul du skyes so //
K10D0340_H0346:100a-11: bu mo skra ldan ma ni /
K10D0340_H0346:100a-12: de dang bral bas sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i skra la
K10D0340_H0346:100a-13: 'jus nas shin tu mya ngan byed cing dbugs 'dril
K10D0340_H0346:100a-14: la smre sngags 'don cing brang brdungs te sus kyang
K10D0340_H0346:100a-15: de'i mya ngan bsang ma nus so //
K10D0340_H0346:100a-16: de nas gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sku cher 'khrungs pa de'i tshe des rgan po dang /
K10D0340_H0346:100a-18: shi ba gzigs nas nags kyi nang du rten bcas
K10D0340_H0346:100a-19: te lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyad nas
K10D0340_H0346:100a-20: bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes te /
K10D0340_H0346:100a-21: mthar gyis 'dul ba'i don mdzad cing yul ser skya'i gnas su gshegs so //
K10D0340_H0346:100a-22: de der gshegs nas sh'akya rnams rab tu phyung ngo //
K10D0340_H0346:100b-0: skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta m'i'ang rab tu phyung @100b ngo //
K10D0340_H0346:100b-1: skra ldan ma'ang rab tu phyung ste /
K10D0340_H0346:100b-2: des kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K10D0340_H0346:100b-3: de bcom ldan 'das kyis brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to //
K10D0340_H0346:100b-4: de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10D0340_H0346:100b-6: skra ldan mas las ci bgyis na; de'i rnam par
K10D0340_H0346:100b-7: smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che
K10D0340_H0346:100b-8: ba'i sh'akya'i rigs su skyes lags /
K10D0340_H0346:100b-10: des bran mo gzhan gyi mngag gzhug bgyid par gyur lags /
K10D0340_H0346:100b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0340_H0346:100b-12: smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to //
K10D0340_H0346:100b-13: 'dis gang du smon lam btab lags; dge slong dag /
K10D0340_H0346:100b-14: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu
K10D0340_H0346:100b-15: bcu rtsa gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
K10D0340_H0346:100b-16: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
K10D0340_H0346:100b-20: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10D0340_H0346:100b-21: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10D0340_H0346:100b-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10D0340_H0346:101a-0: de bla na med pa yang dag @101a *//
K10D0340_H0346:101a-1: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas grong khyer gnyer ldan du gshegs te /
K10D0340_H0346:101a-2: de lcam gnyis kyis bshos gsol ba na der gcig gis smon lam btab pa /
K10D0340_H0346:101a-3: bdag las 'di lta bu'i skyes bu rin po che btsas te de mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10D0340_H0346:101a-4: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas
K10D0340_H0346:101a-5: so; ;bu mo gcig shos kyis smon lam btab pa
K10D0340_H0346:101a-6: / bdag kyang gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der khyod dang spun du gyur cig /
K10D0340_H0346:101a-7: bdag 'di lta bu'i skyes bu rin po che de 'tsho bar gyur cig ces byas so //
K10D0340_H0346:101a-8: de spun gnyis kyi skra mkhan byed pa'i bu mo de'ang de na 'dug par gyur te /
K10D0340_H0346:101a-9: bu mo des kyang de gnyis kyis smon lam de
K10D0340_H0346:101a-10: lta bu de btab pa thos nas thos ma tham
K10D0340_H0346:101a-11: tu des kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
K10D0340_H0346:101a-12: rnam par gzigs la bkur sti byas te smon lam
K10D0340_H0346:101a-13: btab pa / kye ma bdag kyang dge ba'i rtsa
K10D0340_H0346:101a-14: ba 'dis 'di gnyis gang dang gang du skyes pa
K10D0340_H0346:101a-15: de dang der bdag 'di gnyis kyi skra mkhan ma
K10D0340_H0346:101a-16: bsnyen bkur byed par gyur nas 'di gnyis kyi bu
K10D0340_H0346:101a-17: rin po che mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10D0340_H0346:101a-18: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas te /
K10D0340_H0346:101a-19: der 'dis smon lam 'di lta bu btab bo //
K10D0340_H0346:101a-22: 'dis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te /
K10D0340_H0346:101a-23: mi mnyes par ma bgyis te /
K10D0340_H0346:101b-0: @101b bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu
K10D0340_H0346:101b-1: byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra
K10D0340_H0346:101b-2: bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis nas bcom ldan
K10D0340_H0346:101b-3: 'das kyis brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyi mchog tu'ang
K10D0340_H0346:101b-4: bstan lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0340_H0346:101b-5: 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ste /
K10D0340_H0346:101b-6: gang las rab tu byung ba'i mkhan mo de ni /
K10D0340_H0346:101b-7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis
K10D0340_H0346:101b-8: brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to
K10D0340_H0346:101b-9: // de nas de'i tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa /
K10D0340_H0346:101b-10: 'di ltar bdag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
K10D0340_H0346:101b-11: rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la tshangs par spyod
K10D0340_H0346:101b-12: pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma
K10D0340_H0346:101b-13: thob kyi / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
K10D0340_H0346:101b-14: 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan
K10D0340_H0346:101b-15: pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
K10D0340_H0346:101b-16: bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10D0340_H0346:101b-17: mi mnyas par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10D0340_H0346:101b-18: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas
K10D0340_H0346:101b-19: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa
K10D0340_H0346:101b-20: nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig /
K10D0340_H0346:101b-21: ji ltar bdag gi mkhan mo yang dag par rdzogs
K10D0340_H0346:101b-22: pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis brtson 'grus brtsams pa
K10D0340_H0346:101b-23: rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag
K10D0340_H0346:102a-0: sh'akya'i rgyal po des brtson 'grus brtsams @102a *//
K10D0340_H0346:102a-1: pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10D0340_H0346:102a-4: de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od

K10D0340_H0346:264a-0: ma nus nas de dag gis @264a *//

K10D0340_H0346:264a-3: 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa yan chad su'i gzi
K10D0340_H0346:264a-4: byin yang dbrog par ma nus pa 'di su'i mthu
K10D0340_H0346:264a-5: yin pa je dri bar bya'o snyam nas ba lang

K10D0340_H0346:264a-12: khyab par byas te 'dug pa de'i mthus na; yul
K10D0340_H0346:264a-13: 'dir sus kyang gnod pa cung zad kyang byed mi
K10D0340_H0346:264a-14: nus so // gnod sbyin rnams kyis bsam pa /

K10D0340_H0346:264a-23: stobs kyi thad du song nas smras pa /

K10D0340_H0346:265a-15: byin bsnan nas gtar ka de dag kyang che rab

K10D0340_H0346:265a-18: po de dag dka' ba med par tshim par byas

K10D0340_H0346:265b-15: par mdzad pa de'i tshe bdag cag khyod kyi nyan
K10D0340_H0346:265b-17: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /

K10D0340_H0346:267b-16: 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste chu

K10D0340_H0346:267b-25: ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te

K10D0340_H0346:268a-1: la dka' ba mdzad pa dang /

K10D0340_H0346:268a-8: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10D0340_H0346:268a-9: des na tshong pa lnga brgya po de dag gis

K10D0340_H0346:268a-13: du byas te de dag gis bden pa mthong nas

K10D0340_H0346:268a-16: su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das

K10D0340_H0346:268a-20: bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na /
K10D0340_H0346:268a-21: bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //

K10D0340_H0346:268a-23: slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu

K10D0340_H0346:268a-26: de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang /

K10D0340_H0346:403b-4: thos pa rnams ma gtad kyi bar du mya ngan

K10D0340_H0346:403b-8: byung ste des kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum
K10D0340_H0346:403b-9: du byas te / de la'ang thos pa rnams ma
K10D0340_H0346:403b-10: gtad kyi bar du yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
K10D0340_H0346:403b-12: de la'ang 'di skad ces gyis shig /

K10D0340_H0346:403b-26: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /

K10D0340_H0346:404a-4: pos so so skye bo'i dge 'dun dag khrid de
K10D0340_H0346:404a-6: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po
K10D0340_H0346:404a-7: song nas ring po ma lon par bcom ldan 'das

K10D0340_H0346:404a-14: legs so snyam du dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

K10D0340_H0346:404a-21: po rnams kyis gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan

K10D0340_H0346:404a-23: rgyal po chen po bzhi la bka' stsal pa /

K10D0340_H0346:404b-5: mi bde ba'i rlung ldang bar 'gyur te /

K10D0340_H0346:404b-7: char ma bab pas chu klung dang khron pa rnams chu nyung bar 'gyur zhing /

K10D0340_H0346:404b-10: de dag kyang ser bas med par byed do //

K10D0340_H0346:404b-12: mu ge byung nas mi rnams zas khro rgod za bar 'gyur te /
